A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: A well written and well acted movie\, I felt they killed off Snoke too early\, and the pacing perhaps could have used a bit more work but its a great addition to the franchise. The patorean guard fight scene is absolutely amazing. \n\nPeople complaining should grow up and realize they wont get the same feeling you did when you first saw the original trilogy.
